title: Suzumiya Haruhi Series: Atezuppo Numbers
original_name: 涼宮ハルヒシリーズ あてずっぽナンバーズ
sinopse:
Random Numbers is a short story featuring the SOS Brigade.

Itsuki Koizumi and Kyon were walking together to a shrine on January 3rd, when Koizumi muttered the number 775,249. Koizumi said that the number had... just popped into his head...

(Source: Haruhi Wikia)
